Site.title: IRAC | Islamic Architecture Center
Site.description: The online home of the Islamic Architecture Center

Footer.aboutText: IRAC is a pioneering institution dedicated to the study, preservation, and advancement of Islamic architecture. We provide courses, workshops, and resources for students and professionals worldwide.
Footer.copyright: © {currentYear} Islamic Architecture Center IRAC | All rights reserved.

HomePage.description: This page demonstrates the correct functioning of the multilingual system and the new project structure.
HomePage.heroTitle: Explore the Beauty of Islamic Architecture
HomePage.heroSubtitle: Discover timeless principles through our courses, workshops, and resources.
HomePage.featuredCoursesDescription: Discover our carefully curated collection of exceptional Islamic architecture courses designed by renowned masters
HomePage.ctaDescription: Join us on a transformative journey of discovering Islamic architecture and expand your knowledge with the finest masters and experts
HomePage.devNoteText: This is a temporary page and should be replaced with the main content. The i18n structure, Tailwind CSS, and existing components are ready for use.
HomePage.iracIntro: The premier center for the study and preservation of Islamic architectural heritage.

FilterDescription.title: Filter Guide
FilterDescription.noActiveFilters: No active filters. You can search for articles from the search section.
FilterDescription.textSearchDescription: Search in article titles, abstracts, and content with desired keywords
FilterDescription.authorsDescription: Filter articles based on author or researcher name
FilterDescription.tagsKeywordsDescription: Find articles related to specific topics and categories
FilterDescription.journalsSourcesDescription: Search based on journal, publication, or source name
FilterDescription.publicationYearDescription: Limit results based on publication date range
FilterDescription.articleTypeDescription: Filter based on article type (research, review, book, etc.)
FilterDescription.tip1: For more precise search, use combination of multiple filters
FilterDescription.tip2: In text search, you can use exact phrases
FilterDescription.tip3: Click on author names or tags in articles to activate related filters
FilterDescription.tip4: You can remove filters individually or clear all at once
